title: Papoula
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Simple atmosphere and a familial vibe. Plates run about 15 reais and include the main dish, brown rice, vegetarian beans and a salad. Vegan options are eggplant preserves and bread, beans, rice and salad and others. Serves squash or eggplant  pizza - ask for no cheese. In-house-made whole wheat bread.
